page.title: 13Employment in Bredfield
page.content: Few people who live in the area also work here. The Forge employs twelve full time and three part time workers. The farms can be run with very few men, and the shops, pub, garage and school employ fewer than fifteen people full time although they provide part time work for many more than that. Some women do part time domestic work in private houses. It is the part time workers usually who live locally. Most people work outside the area, the largest number are employed by the British Telecom Research Station at Martlesham. Felixstowe port also employs several and the rest commute to Melton, Woodbridge, Otley and Ipswich.
